methods.name: getCustomerOrders
methods.doc: Retrieves a set of CustomerOrder objects based on lookup by shared_id

methods.name: generateOrdersFromCustomerCart
methods.doc: Given a Customer with a nonempty cart, creates a set of CustomerOrders and returns shared_id. Cart is unaffected.

methods.name: deleteCustomerOrders
methods.doc: Deletes a set of CustomerOrders denoted by shared_id

methods.name: getTotalPrice
methods.doc: Calculates total price of a set of CustomerOrder of shared_id

methods.name: getAllUnsatisfied
methods.doc: Get all unsatisfied orders of a game.

methods.name: setSatisfied
methods.doc: Mark given orders as satisfied or not.
